Package hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ColoredPointList
    A point list where each point has a color assigned to it.
    IndexedTriangleMesh
    A triangle mesh which provides a list of points and triples of point indices.
    IndexedTriangleStrip
    A triangle strip mesh where the strips use indices to reference the points.
    PointList
    An object which holds a list of points.
    TriangleListIterator
    An iterator over a list of triangles.
    TriangleMesh
    A mesh composed of a set of triangles.
    TriangleStrip
    A mesh composed of triangle strips.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractIndexedTriangleStrip
    Abstract superclass for IndexedTriangleStrip objects implementing the IndexedTriangleMesh and the PointList aspects.
    ColoredPointListImpl
    A straightforward implementation of the ColoredPointList interface using lists to store the data.
    IndexedTriangleMeshImpl
    An implementation of IndexTriangleMesh which stores the points as a list of Vector3 and the triangles as a list of point index triples.
    IndexedTriangleStripImpl
    An implementation of IndexedTriangleStrip which stores the points in a list, and stores the strips as lists of point indices.
    Meshes
    Utility methods operating on meshes.
    PointListImpl
    A straightforward implementation of the PointList interface backed by a list of Vector3 objects.
    TriangleSetImpl
    A triangle mesh which just stores a list of points.
